api_list.name: getShareableLink

required_parameters.name: entryId
required_parameters.description: ID or hash of entry for which to get shareable link

api_list.name: indexEntry
api_list.description: Get the list of all file entries you have access to

optional_parameters.name: perPage
optional_parameters.description: How many entries to return per page

optional_parameters.name: deletedOnly
optional_parameters.description: Whether only trashed entries should be returned

optional_parameters.name: parentIds
optional_parameters.description: Only entries that are children of specified folders will be returned

optional_parameters.name: recentOnly
optional_parameters.description: Whether only recent entries should be returned

optional_parameters.name: sharedOnly
optional_parameters.description: Whether only entries that have been shared with you should be returned

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: File type entries should be filtered on

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Search query entry names should be filtered on

optional_parameters.name: starredOnly
optional_parameters.description: Whether only starred entries should be returned

file_name.description: actual file name for this entry on storage

thumbnail.description: Relative path to thumbnail image for the file (if it exists)

url.description: relative url for previewing file or folder contents

deleted_at.description: date entry was moved to trash (if it's in trash currently)

updated_at.description: date entry was last modified (content, name or location changed)

path.description: full path of parent folder IDs for this entry up to root
